casebody.data:
REAVES
v.
TOWN OF FAIR BLUFF, et al. No. 132P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Brian Edes, Wilmington, for Town of Fair Bluff, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of March 2008 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
